name: Cranberry Dad
description:
Help out your homies and keep them full of cranberry juice from the local tiki bar. Although all that juice has made you quite psyched so watch out you don't fall!

Don't let your homies go empty handed and while you're at it - throw a gnarly disk 🤙🧿

Controls are WSAD for moving and SPACE to throw a caught frisbee.

Produced during the Nordic Game Jam 2023 with the picked themes:
Cranberry Juice, Holiday and Gratitude
